Karl and David are constantly at odds, even as they struggle to adjust to life in their strange new world where talking dinosaurs live side by side in an uneasy alliance with humans. Based upon the book series and the TV miniseries.

programme.title: Strange Relations (aka My Beautiful Son)
programme.desc: When a 39-year-old Jewish New York shrink is diagnosed with leukemia, his mother reveals that he was adopted from a Catholic teenager in the UK.

programme.title: Air Force One Is Down
programme.desc: Alistair Macleans highly charged novel is brought to life for a contemporary audience in this tense, international thriller.

programme.title: Air Force One is Down
programme.desc: Alistair Macleans highly charged novel is brought to life for a contemporary audience in this tense, international thriller.

programme.title: The Wild Girl
programme.desc: Ned Giles, an aspiring news photographer, joins the 1932 Great Apache Expedition on the search for a young boy, the son of a wealthy Mexican land owner who was kidnapped by wild Apaches. Ned finds himself on an unexpected and perilous journey through rugged terrain, when a captured wild Apache girl must be exchanged for the kidnapped boy.

programme.title: On Thin Ice / Breaking Through
programme.desc: Lucia Lobo is a nurse that cannot have children, so she stole 3 babies from the hospital. Filipe, her husband is fooled by thinking hes the one who cant have kids. When her children start to unveil the past, problems begin.

programme.title: Blood Money
programme.desc: The story is about Kunal (Kunal Khemu) who believes he can do anything by trying his hardest. He receives a job offer through his friend Shawn (Teeshay) and his wife Nandini (Puja Gupta (actress)) in Cape Town and moves there with his wife Aarzoo (Amrita Puri). They live a happy life together, until Kunal becomes extremely workaholic. Kunals nature irritates Aarzoo which leads to frequent outbursts and quarrels. Kunal becomes the most trusted employee of his boss Dharmesh Zaveri (Manish Chaudhary). This thing angers Dinesh Zaveri, Dharmesh Zaveris younger brother. Kunal advances in his job. Soon Dharmesh is revealed to be an underworld gangster. The company Kunal works in deals with exporting diamonds; Kunal has no idea that it happens illegally. His boss, Mr. Zakaria, sends his hot colleague Rosa to charm Kunal and take him away from his wife. Following the day when Kunal gets drunk in a party, Rosa takes advantage and manages to make love with him. Kunal reaches his house and finds Aarzoo sleeping and accidentally wakes her up, after which they both pick up a quarrel. Soon enough, Kunal realises the crime he is a part of and decides to and leave Cape Town. However, Zakaria knows that Kunal is aware of the illegal business and the only way to keep him silent is to kill him.

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: Flying Wild Alaska is a reality television show following the lives of the Tweto family who live in the city of Unalakleet and run an important airline in Alaska, transporting passengers and supplies to isolated parts of the state. Jim, his wife Ferno, daughters Ariel and Ayla and a team of pilots provide service to hardly accessible villages on the Bering sea coastline, in often very dangerous missions. Join them in dramatic moments, as they face extreme weather conditions, from icy storms and strong winds to a two month long winter darkness.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Reality series, set in Texas and similar to North Woods Law, that follows daily lives of men and women who are Game Wardens and whose job is to protect deserts, lakes, woods, bayous, coasts and wild animals that live in the second-largest state in the U.S. These people have their plates full as they must deal with poachers, hunters who dont obey the law, smugglers, while they rescue injured wildlife and defend citizens.

programme.title: Preposterous Pets
programme.desc: In this programme, we delve into the stories of eccentric individuals who have developed a special relationship with unusual, exotic animals, ranging from giant alligators and polar bears to deadly scorpions and wild capybaras. Join us as we set out on a journey across the globe to meet these extraordinary pets and their owners.

programme.title: Extinct or Alive
programme.desc: Extinct or Alive is an Animal Planet documentary show exploring the possible existence of animals thought to be extinct. Biologist and explorer Forrest Galante follows real life stories and visits wildlife locations across the planet, hoping to discover proof that animals such as the Zanzibar leopard or the Galapagos tortoise still exist. Find out if his methods will bring new exciting discoveries. Could animals we think are extinct for a century still be found in nature?

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: Intruders features horror stories of terrifying animal home intrusions across America. People are getting through dramatic events and have to make fast decisions and be brave in order to reclaim their homes. Families are protecting their homes from grizzly bears, fighting with coyotes, keeping themselves safe from venomous snakes, being attacked by bees and crickets, and trying hard to get rid of the intruders.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Follow aquarium enthusiasts Brett Raymer and Wayde King as they attempt to build some of the most luxurious fish tanks in the world. At Acrylic Tank Manufacturing, the brothers-in-law guide you through the design process and the building of their truly jaw-dropping aquariums. Experience the unveiling of finished tanks housed everywhere from restaurants and banks, to glamorous casinos and mansions. Join the duo in their Las Vegas workshop as they deliver some budget-shattering builds to their high-profile clientele.

programme.title: Animal Cops: Phoenix
programme.desc: Animal Cops: Phoenix shines a light on the work of the Arizona Humane Society (AHS). The AHS is an agency concentrating on the welfare and protection of Arizonas animal community. On the road with AHS field operations team assist local police services, attend rescue situations and examine cases of suspected animal cruelty. Animal cruelty investigators and Emergency Animal Medical Technicians are on hand to do all they can to help the creatures. Meanwhile, back at the AHS Trauma Hospital, animals receive medical care and behavioural treatment with the hope of finding someone to adopt them.

programme.title: Animal Cops: Phoenix
programme.desc: Animal Cops: Phoenix shines a light on the work of the Arizona Humane Society (AHS). The AHS is an agency concentrating on the welfare and protection of Arizonas animal community. On the road with AHS field operations team assist local police services, attend rescue situations and examine cases of suspected animal cruelty. Animal cruelty investigators and Emergency Animal Medical Technicians are on hand to do all they can to help the creatures. Meanwhile, back at the AHS Trauma Hospital, animals receive medical care and behavioural treatment with the hope of finding someone to adopt them.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Today is a first for Gulf Coast Veterinary Specialists. Nia, a 6-year-old white Bengal tiger, is being brought to them for an ovarian hysterectomy to remove her uterus and ovaries. Complications arise while Nia is on the operating table, and it takes a true team effort to pull Nia back from the brink of death while completing the operation. Harley, a therapy puppy for a little girl, who broke her leg, gets a screw inserted in her leg to help her bone to heal. Spirit the cockatiel fights a losing battle with a growth in her throat. And 9-year-old lab mix Duchess undergoes surgery to remove a growth near her brain that saves her life.

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: Intruders features horror stories of terrifying animal home intrusions across America. People are getting through dramatic events and have to make fast decisions and be brave in order to reclaim their homes. Families are protecting their homes from grizzly bears, fighting with coyotes, keeping themselves safe from venomous snakes, being attacked by bees and crickets, and trying hard to get rid of the intruders.

programme.title: Dogs/Cats/Pets
programme.desc: Cats and dogs are welcome companions in many homes, with their loving characters cementing their status as part of the family. This documentary series divulges extraordinary facts about cats and dogs, offering unique insight into their traits and behaviours. Learn about quirky breeds and their distinct qualities, discover their wonderful talents and explore the different ways we humans use them.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: US reality TV show follows the Irwin family through their adventures in continuing Steve Irwins legacy. The family share their wildlife experiences from their travels across the world. They show how they care for all the animals while giving insight into their family life at Australia Zoo where they live and work. The Australian family including mother Terri who is a naturalist and conservationist stars alongside daughter Bindi and son Robert who are fully immerse in animal life and their family.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the Bronx Zoo, one of the largest zoos in the USA and the largest city zoo the country has to offer. Opening their doors to camera crews, the daily operations of the world-famous animal sanctuary are revealed, as the staff keep their loving creatures healthy and happy. Renowned for its diverse collection of animals and wonderful exhibitions, the Bronx Zoo is one of the finest in the world, home to lions, bears, tigers, snow leopards, baboons, flamingos and many more extravagant species. This series showcases the effort, experience and expertise required to run the Bronx Zoo.

programme.title: Jeremy Wades Dark Waters
programme.desc: Join biologist and angling expert Jeremy Wade as he travels the world peering through our darkest, murky waters, investigating tales of mythical monsters, mutated beasts and depleting fish populations. The star of River Monsters is back to explain the unexplainable, as he investigates these reported sightings of unknown creatures. Whether its Lake Gardas reptilian monster, a species of pike the size of a man, a river monster deemed extinct in the Outback or South Africas fabled half-man, half-fish monster, Jeremy will need to use all of his experience if he is to catch, or even glimpse, these creatures.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet is a TV series entirely dedicated to love and care for animals. Thanks to a genius Dr. Jeff Young Denvers Planned Pethood Plus veterinary clinic is always busy and is taking care of 80,000-plus clients and their pets. Dr. Jeffs sharp surgical skills and his unconditional love for animals make him one of the most respected vets in the country. Dr. Jeff has a dedicated team of more than 30 veterinary staffers and once a month they go to remote locations where people do not have access to vets.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Follow aquarium enthusiasts Brett Raymer and Wayde King as they attempt to build some of the most luxurious fish tanks in the world. At Acrylic Tank Manufacturing, the brothers-in-law guide you through the design process and the building of their truly jaw-dropping aquariums. Experience the unveiling of finished tanks housed everywhere from restaurants and banks, to glamorous casinos and mansions. Join the duo in their Las Vegas workshop as they deliver some budget-shattering builds to their high-profile clientele.

programme.title: Animal Cops: Phoenix
programme.desc: Animal Cops: Phoenix shines a light on the work of the Arizona Humane Society (AHS). The AHS is an agency concentrating on the welfare and protection of Arizonas animal community. On the road with AHS field operations team assist local police services, attend rescue situations and examine cases of suspected animal cruelty. Animal cruelty investigators and Emergency Animal Medical Technicians are on hand to do all they can to help the creatures. Meanwhile, back at the AHS Trauma Hospital, animals receive medical care and behavioural treatment with the hope of finding someone to adopt them.

programme.title: Lone Star Law

programme.title: Guardians of Rescue
programme.desc: Follow a group of men and women coming from a range of backgrounds, united in their love for animals and in their mission to rescue them, as well as educate and motivate people to follow their lead. Their main concern is helping animals in need, but it is also strengthening the bond with animals that has always been present in human lives, emphasising the importance of nurturing that relationship.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Treehouse Masters is an American reality television series hosted by Pete Nelson, a treehouse builder. Pete and his team design and build all types of treehouses for clients across the country. The clients and Petes team are the people who never stop dreaming. Youll be surprised to know how many people want to get away from the noisy comfortable cities and live in close communion with mother nature. So getting a treehouse is their chance to live a dream. Every episode will amaze you because of Petes talent and incredible imagination. He can build any type of a treehouse, starting from a small simple ones to most complex residences with all modern communication. Every wish of a customer will be heard and fulfilled.

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: American reality series following the team at the Villalobos Rescue centre on their quest to rescue and rehome dogs. Founded by Tia Maria Torres, the centre challenges the misconceptions surrounding bully breeds, such as pit bulls, with hopes of eventually rehoming them. Alongside Tia are her team of dog-loving parolees, each tasked with training, rescuing and caring for the animals. Each episode covers the emotional stories of both her employees and their rescue dogs. Will their jobs help them as they transition away from jail or will they struggle alongside the pups to rebuild their reputation?

programme.title: My Cat from Hell
programme.desc: Jackson Galaxy is a cat behaviorist. He is the person who resolves conflicts or behavioral issues between the owners and their cats or even between the cats and other pets. These are attacks and misbehavior, and Jackson is a true cat-lover and a believer that any problem can be solved thanks to love, patience and proper handling. Taking good care of cats is a demanding process and a whole science, but in return you will get a loving and purring family member.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: US reality TV show follows the Irwin family through their adventures in continuing Steve Irwins legacy. The family share their wildlife experiences from their travels across the world. They show how they care for all the animals while giving insight into their family life at Australia Zoo where they live and work. Pets include Chinchillas, dogs, cats and snakes and possibly many more.

programme.title: Sharks Among Us
programme.desc: Shark encounters are increasing, but the solutions to prevent them prove deadly to sharks. Can Dr. Craig OConnell prove that sharks and people can peacefully coexist? S/1/1

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: Flying Wild Alaska is a reality television show following the lives of the Tweto family who live in the city of Unalakleet and run an important airline in Alaska, transporting passengers and supplies to isolated parts of the state. Jim, his wife Ferno, daughters Ariel and Ayla and a team of pilots provide service to hardly accessible villages on the Bering sea coastline, in often very dangerous missions. Join them in dramatic moments, as they face extreme weather conditions, from icy storms and strong winds to a two month long winter darkness.

programme.title: Lone Star Law

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Natures great predators are animals you dont want to come across, especially when you find yourself in their own backyard. In this heart-pumping documentary series, individuals share their stories of encounters with dangerous animals, reliving the frightful, life-threatening ordeal. With stories from across the world, we reveal the heart-in-mouth moments when these lucky individuals managed to escape the jaws of death. From a swimmer mauled by a bull shark in the Bahamas to a close shave with a grizzly bear in the mountains, these stories showcase the fearsome power of predators.

programme.title: Preposterous Pets
programme.desc: In this programme, we delve into the stories of eccentric individuals who have developed a special relationship with unusual, exotic animals, ranging from giant alligators and polar bears to deadly scorpions and wild capybaras. Join us as we set out on a journey across the globe to meet these extraordinary pets and their owners.

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: Intruders features horror stories of terrifying animal home intrusions across America. programme.title: The Context
programme.desc: The presenter and his regular panel of guests discuss the most important and relevant news stories of the day with correspondents around the globe. Join for expert analysis of the latest big events and exclusive interviews covering various current affair issues.

programme.title: The Context USA
programme.desc: Special coverage from Washington DC and London, focusing on President Trumps second term.

programme.title: The Context USA
programme.desc: Special coverage from Washington DC and London, focusing on President Trumps second term.

programme.title: My Ultimate Turkey with Nikki Bedi
programme.desc: Arts lover and BBC presenter Nikki Bedi travels to the south west of Turkey.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and union leaders, and analytical reports that delve behind the headlines. Regular presenters cross-examine studio guests on details of policies, priorities, actions and inactions, on a range of domestic UK and international topics. There are weekly features on the arts, sports and the world of technology, and editors are not afraid to venture into niche, specialist and exotic areas from space travel to animal psychology. If the BBCs flagship Radio 4 Today programme sets the early morning news agenda for the day, then its late-night TV equivalent often gives the people in power some sleepless nights.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: Join BBC journalists including political editor Laura Kuenssberg, Europe editor Katya Adler, Brussels correspondent Adam Fleming and political correspondent Chris Mason in their weekly podcast discussing all of the news stories that matter to the people of the United Kingdom. The journalists know all about the stories that theyre talking about - they interview the most important people involved in the stories that feature in the news. They speak of their knowledge and understanding of the news in a way that is understandable for all. Laura is often in a car in the middle of a city where big politics stories are happening. Katya, Adam and Chris are usually in the studio. They regularly talk about Brexit and what is going to happen when the United Kingdom leaves the European Union.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Tech Now
programme.desc: Adrienne Murray meets the engineers designing icebreaker ship technology.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: Business Today
programme.desc: The latest business news from Singapore and around the world.

programme.title: BBC Sport
programme.desc: A round-up of the days sporting action.

programme.title: Focus on Africa
programme.desc: Focus on Africa is a BBC news program broadcast globally and on local partner channels of the BBC in African countries. The program used to be presented by Komla Dumor each weekday from its inception until his death in 2014; now it is hosted by Sophie Ikenye, a news presenter from Kenya. The program includes news, sport and business from across Africa and the rest of the globe. Get the top African stories and keep up with the latest international events.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and union leaders, and analytical reports that delve behind the headlines. Regular presenters cross-examine studio guests on details of policies, priorities, actions and inactions, on a range of domestic UK and international topics. There are weekly features on the arts, sports and the world of technology, and editors are not afraid to venture into niche, specialist and exotic areas from space travel to animal psychology. If the BBCs flagship Radio 4 Today programme sets the early morning news agenda for the day, then its late-night TV equivalent often gives the people in power some sleepless nights.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: Join BBC journalists including political editor Laura Kuenssberg, Europe editor Katya Adler, Brussels correspondent Adam Fleming and political correspondent Chris Mason in their weekly podcast discussing all of the news stories that matter to the people of the United Kingdom. The journalists know all about the stories that theyre talking about - they interview the most important people involved in the stories that feature in the news. They speak of their knowledge and understanding of the news in a way that is understandable for all. Laura is often in a car in the middle of a city where big politics stories are happening. Katya, Adam and Chris are usually in the studio. They regularly talk about Brexit and what is going to happen when the United Kingdom leaves the European Union.

programme.title: BBC News

programme.title: AI Decoded
programme.desc: AI Decoded sits down with James Muldoon, author of new book Love Machines.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: Talking Movies
programme.desc: Join for the latest news from the world of film, including everything from documentaries to mainstream, indie and world cinema. The presenter travels all over the world, attending the greatest festivals and exclusive premieres, interviewing all the biggest stars, which over the years included big names such as Jude Law, Catherine Zeta Jones, Eathan Hawke, Ben Kingsley, Sally Hawkins and many others. The show also explores the newest trends and issues in the world of cinema.

BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: Join BBC journalists including political editor Laura Kuenssberg, Europe editor Katya Adler, Brussels correspondent Adam Fleming and political correspondent Chris Mason in their weekly podcast discussing all of the news stories that matter to the people of the United Kingdom. The journalists know all about the stories that theyre talking about - they interview the most important people involved in the stories that feature in the news. They speak of their knowledge and understanding of the news in a way that is understandable for all. Laura is often in a car in the middle of a city where big politics stories are happening. Katya, Adam and Chris are usually in the studio. They regularly talk about Brexit and what is going to happen when the United Kingdom leaves the European Union.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: The Media Show
programme.desc: How US newspapers delayed reporting military strike amid national security concerns.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Главные события сериала разворачиваются в столице до появления Национальной полиции, во время волны резонансных преступлений. За расследование запутанных дел берется лучший оперативник города, нетипичный майор и любимчик женщин Виктор Таран. Объявив войну криминальному миру, он переходит дорогу руководству, влиятельным авторитетам и завистливым коллегам.

programme.title: Отважные
programme.desc: Сериал рассказывает о работе специального подразделения полиции, занимающегося проблемами домашнего насилия. Четыре главные героини помогают женщинам, детям и даже мужчинам, страдающим от тирании, побоев, унижений и других способов угнетения со стороны близких людей. Героини сериала будут попадать в сложные и опасные ситуации, спасая жизни и восстанавливая справедливость. Каждая женщина из этой четверки тоже прошла через насилие: у каждой – своя история, скелет в шкафу и сильная мотивация заниматься именно этим делом.

programme.title: Никонов и Ко
programme.desc: На вечеринке "Трансгаза" был отравлен вице-президент компании. Раскрыть "щекотливое" дело берутся Никонов, Скребцов и Аня. Но что стало причиной трагедии: любовные связи или грязный бизнес?

programme.title: Никонов и Ко
programme.desc: В результате перестрелки 38-летний оперативный работник следственного отдела МВД Сергий Никонов получает тяжелейшую травму позвоночника. У Сергея парализованы ноги, он может передвигаться лишь в инвалидном кресле. Чтобы отвлечься от своей личной трагедии и справиться с депрессией, Сергей организовывает у себя в квартире неофициальный отдел по расследованию криминальных преступлений.

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. Он уверен, что авария была подстроена и убийство отца, известного хирурга, было спланировано. Чтобы провести собственное расследование, Крылов соглашается вернуться к работе в полиции…

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Крылов обнаруживает странную статистику смертей пациентов в клинике, где работал его отец и просит свою помощницу и подругу Матвеевну устроиться туда на работу "под прикрытием". Борису не дают покоя несколько фактов в деле убийства сына олигарха. Крылов проводит необычный следственный эксперимент и понимает, как именно было совершено это преступление…

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. В арсенале у участников ГСР (группы стратегического реагирования) не только высокотехнологичное оружие, но еще и быстрый ум, интуиция и… багаж собственных проблем и травм, которые часто влияют на их работу.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. В арсенале у участников ГСР (группы стратегического реагирования) не только высокотехнологичное оружие, но еще и быстрый ум, интуиция и… багаж собственных проблем и травм, которые часто влияют на их работу.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Главные события сериала разворачиваются в столице до появления Национальной полиции, во время волны резонансных преступлений. За расследование запутанных дел берется лучший оперативник города, нетипичный майор и любимчик женщин Виктор Таран. Объявив войну криминальному миру, он переходит дорогу руководству, влиятельным авторитетам и завистливым коллегам.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев

programme.title: Отважные
programme.desc: Сериал рассказывает о работе специального подразделения полиции, занимающегося проблемами домашнего насилия. Четыре главные героини помогают женщинам, детям и даже мужчинам, страдающим от тирании, побоев, унижений и других способов угнетения со стороны близких людей. Героини сериала будут попадать в сложные и опасные ситуации, спасая жизни и восстанавливая справедливость. Каждая женщина из этой четверки тоже прошла через насилие: у каждой – своя история, скелет в шкафу и сильная мотивация заниматься именно этим делом.

programme.title: Никонов и Ко
programme.desc: В результате перестрелки 38-летний оперативный работник следственного отдела МВД Сергий Никонов получает тяжелейшую травму позвоночника. У Сергея парализованы ноги, он может передвигаться лишь в инвалидном кресле. Чтобы отвлечься от своей личной трагедии и справиться с депрессией, Сергей организовывает у себя в квартире неофициальный отдел по расследованию криминальных преступлений.

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. Он уверен, что авария была подстроена и убийство отца, известного хирурга, было спланировано. Чтобы провести собственное расследование, Крылов соглашается вернуться к работе в полиции…

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Расследование в больнице не продвигается, улик у Крылова нет. Голубев рассказывает Алеше, что он его кровный отец. Лариса лжет Крылову по непонятным причинам. На рассвете в парке обнаруживают тело обеспеченной женщины. Она была известна в городе, как жестокая и несправедливая руководительница, увольнявшая людей за малейшие недочеты. Поэтому подозреваемых много.

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Борис выясняет, что нападение на Ларису — инсценировка. Но бывшая жена запутывает мужчину. Борис признается Анне в любви, но ей не до романтики: проблемы с сыном усугубляются, Алеша обвиняет мать в том, что она скрыла правду об отце. В убийстве женщины в парке подозревают ее многочисленных ухажеров. Но Крылову удается установить реальную цепь событий.

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Крылов узнает, что погиб один из подозреваемых в деле об аварии. Кто-то считает эксперта серьезным врагом. Анна в шоке от новости о том, что сын связался с Голубевым. В безлюдной части города обнаружено тело мужчины в женском облачении. Погибший — трансвестит, завсегдатай престижного клуба для лиц нетрадиционной ориентации. Когда Крылов начал копаться в деле, убили еще одного постоянного посетителя клуба.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are shocked to realise that their class isnt the only one in Elmore Junior High. / Dad discovers that Granny Jojo and Louie plan to get married and move to Florida. To stop this happening he adopts Louie so that he can forbid him from marrying Granny Jojo. / After they receive an extravagant invitation to Masamis birthday party Gumball and Darwin are anxious to find just the right gift for her. However theyre not the only ones. / Gumball sets out to prove to Pennys father that hes good enough for his daughter. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin see an advert for the latest, cutting-edge Bobert operating system and excitedly talk Bobert into downloading it. At first it seems like a massive improvement, but the many flaws in the new operating system become increasingly apparent. After the upgraded Bobert malfunctions one too many times, the kids decide to reinstall his old operating system. But will they be able to downgrade from the upgrade and get their old friend back?

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: The Stump Kids seek Kenneths help but find an annoyed Xavier instead - they visit the Elders who were once friends with Kenneth and David calls him, but Mark gets into an argument over how much he has changed. When David and Barry leave and the kids have no answer, they watch Kenneths anime, realise that the Heart of the Forest is from the show, and vow to find it... but all while unaware that Xavier is spying on them with his drones.

So Lana finds one, but its got a mind of its own. Lana and Andar must find common ground before the beard and its previous owner steal their ship.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: When Lana abandons the crew mid-quest to go on a personal quest to complete her collection of Flap Shack collectibles, Lana finds herself at the centre of a deadly trap while the crew of the Mighty Windbreaker struggle without her during an active volcano evacuation.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny amazing sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Darwin asks Gumball to teach him how to skate Gumball makes sure that he covers every aspect of the skating lifestyle - from wearing the right gear using the right terms and choosing the right board. But when Darwin finally gets his wheels rolling he realises there might be one important aspect of skating that Gumball hasnt taught him...

At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: What We Know with Max Foster
programme.desc: Max Foster has a definitive roundup of the days top stories, giving you the urgent need-to-know context, plus a deeper dive into the questions sparking debate around the world.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: The Brief with Jim Sciutto
programme.desc: The best of CNNs reporting from correspondents across the world, to guide global audiences through the fast-paced news cycle with insight, analysis and hard-hitting interviews.

programme.title: Quest Means Business
programme.desc: Hes not messing around: Richard Quest presents his hot takes on the biggest breaking stories in the world of business. Watch for the expert analysis, commentary and opinions on the important headlines in the field from the notorious English journalist and CNN anchor. Joined by a cast of experts and correspondents delivering unrivaled facts and news, but also features and fascinating takes, figures and analysis on everything going down in the world of business.

programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Hosted by Erin Burnett, an expert in political science and economics, OutFront is an hour-long news programme examining the latest stories from the US and further afield. Broadcast live from either the New York studio or live on location from the site of a breaking story, the show features insightful opinions from informed guests. With expert analysis from CNNs correspondents and analysis from the shows panel, Erin Burnett OutFront dissects the stories of the day, leaving no stone unturned. Burnett, a former financial analyst for Goldman Sachs, uses her forthright approach to engage interviewees in honest discussion.

programme.title: Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper delves into the days news, looking beyond the broadcast to give his take, prompting us to re-think what we hear in the headlines. Cooper has covered major, international stories like the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina on the Gulf Coast, the catastrophic BP oil spill and the 2010 earthquake in Haiti, which saw the whole world fall silent. The show has won an absolute plethora of awards over the years, including GLAAD Media and Emmy awards.

programme.title: The Source with Kaitlan Collins
programme.desc: Kaitlan Collins goes straight to the source for the best reporting on the days biggest stories.

programme.title: CNN NewsNight
programme.desc: Magazino. Current affairs show with Abby Phillip.

programme.title: Laura Coates Live
programme.desc: Magazino. Current affairs show.

programme.title: The Story Is: With Elex Michaelson
programme.desc: Elex Michaelson tackles the breaking stories making headlines with sharp analysis, fresh perspective, and a dose of humor.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: CNN Newroom provides the most up to date news as it breaks and is the longest running show on the channel, airing twice a day Monday to Friday and throughout the day over the weekends. CNN has developed a lot since its founding in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner as a 24 hour cable news channel. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen
programme.desc: Jared and crew race to maximize his bid for the Forever Claim and protect Cypress Creeks future from the competition.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Parkers Trail
programme.desc: Following on from his earlier adventures prospecting for gold in the contiguous 48 states, Gold Rush: Parkers Trail focuses on the further exploits of presenter Parker Schnabel as he attempts to make new discoveries in other areas. With his companion, Rick Ness, Schnabel endeavours to travel the deadly Klondike Trail over the Chilkoot Pass and up the Yukon River to Dawson City tracing the steps of the 1897 Gold Rush prospectors. Other series take Schnabel on a hiking and mining undertaking in Guyana; to Papua New Guinea where they sail, fly, hike and drive to reach their destination; and to Australia, the island nation that experienced several gold rushes from 1851 onwards.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: American reality series is about Alaskan pioneers Yule and Ruth Kilcher and their kids living together at their homestead. The Kilchers demonstrate one-of-a-kind model of surviving in severe conditions of the last frontier. Enjoy amazing panorama views of Alaska, showing its various nature. Sitting in a comfortable chair in your warm apartment just try to imagine how it really is when electricity and running water is not inevitable fact of life. The Kilchers hunt, go fishing, garden, gather, raise livestock in order to survive Alaskas uncontrollable power and wilderness.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Paul Cowland travel across the United Kingdom to uncover classic cars to buy, restore and sell on for a profit. The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: Misfit Garage
programme.desc: Misfit Garage is a reality TV show, a spin off from Fast N Loud. It features two of the mechanics fired from that shows Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage, Tom Smith and Jordan Butler, as well as Thomas Weeks and Scot McMillan, who together start a new company, Fired Up Garage. The crew run into former co-workers of the shop they were all fired from by Richard Rawlings and who they later find out is their new shop landlord. It takes a lot of courage to face the problems from the past and deal with the challenging present, but this is exactly what the guys do.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether. In some episodes participants start the adventure and travel to Alaska to search for gold because of financial issues. They do not have any previous experience and have to learn on the job. Then there appears several gold mining teams that compete with each other. In some episodes the teams move to South America. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen
programme.desc: Jared and crew race to maximize his bid for the Forever Claim and protect Cypress Creeks future from the competition.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How Do They Do It? Ever wondered how the stripes get into toothpaste or how contact lenses are made? How do goods get from one country to another and then into our supermarkets? What are car tires made from and exactly why are plasma TV screens flat? Eating, drinking, driving, flying. These all are activities that we carry out with barely a second thought. But have you ever wondered what exactly goes into your teabag and how it got there? How does an airport handle hundreds of thousands of items of luggage each day? And just how can a cars airbag inflate so quickly? Every day – often without even realizing it – we come into contact with technology, be it in the bathroom, in the car or on the golf course. We take a look at how things work, and focus on some of the most amazing examples of everyday objects including the worlds fastest elevator and the most expensive chocolate money can buy.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Insane Pools Off the Deep End
programme.desc: Insane Pools: Off the Deep End is a home improvement show that follows pool designer Lucas Congdon and his team from Lucas Lagoons. Congdon and his crew renovate existing pools and build new ones on residential properties. Thanks to their unbelievable imagination, creativity and professionalism they can turn every pool into an ultimate backyard oasis for a whole family and transform it into a natural lagoon. They prefer working with hand-selected stones from Tennessee.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. In addition to the landscape itself working against the duo, the local wildlife stalk them as well. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Garage Rehab
programme.desc: American petrol head and reality TV star, Richard Rawlings, famous for his show Fast N Loud, visits struggling garages and car workshops that are desperate for a helping hand. Alongside the team of world-class mechanics from his Gas Monkey Garage, Richard invests his precious time and money to get these toiling businesses back where they belong. The team visit workshops all over the USA, using their knowledge and experience to rev up the old girls and get their engines purring once more. With a serious amount of elbow grease on top of the help from Richards team, the owners have a shot once more at a successful business.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: As the modern world becomes progressively automated and mechanised its easy to become detached from how things are made and how they work. The hit series returns to uncover the miraculous feats of engineering which underpin life in the 21st century. How the seemingly mundane are often the result of highly sophisticated engineering and production processes. This fascinating behind-the-scenes journey delves deep into the production of everyday modern items from surfboards to satchels and trombones to cricket bats.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: Ant Anstead: Born Mechanic
programme.desc: Master mechanic Ant Anstead goes back to basics as he buys, restores and sells old cars from a ramshackle barn. But this time, its personal, as any profit made will help him renovate a 500-year-old farmhouse that hes bought for his parents to retire in.

programme.title: Truck Dynasty
programme.desc: NBA superstar Shaquille ONeal shows up unannounced at Apocalypse to order a custom 4x4 Juggernaut truck. Frank and Pop go into firefighter training.

programme.title: Fast n Loud
programme.desc: Fast N Loud is a reality styled TV show featuring Richard Rawlings and his crew from the Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage. For most people old rusty cars in garages or open spaces are nothing but junk, but not for these guys. For them it is a perfect chance to reconstruct such vehicles and make some money. The old run-down cars are restored flawlessly and are able to run steadily for the next 10 years for sure. Richard and his crew work really hard to make a name for themselves and have become a huge success thanks to their enormous talents.

programme.title: Devils Canyon
programme.desc: Follow three extreme prospectors - Boyce Goff, Ben van der Valk and John Belchik, as they separately go into the remote British Columbias Devils Canyon, where big mining companies cant reach, with no camera crew and no help. The area is known for having the largest amounts of gold the world has ever seen, and the men are going old-school to pan-mine for it, with hopes of making a fortune. They will have to survive the harsh terrain and imposing winter only with food and supplies they carried on their back.

programme.title: Devils Canyon
programme.desc: Follow three extreme prospectors - Boyce Goff, Ben van der Valk and John Belchik, as they separately go into the remote British Columbias Devils Canyon, where big mining companies cant reach, with no camera crew and no help. programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: The worlds toughest treasure hunters push their bodies and bank accounts to the limit on a quest to strike it rich, hunting the legendary Queen of Gems - Opal. Australia produces more than 90% of the worlds opals. Hidden beneath outback desert plains lies a hidden bounty, 30 million years in the making, waiting to be discovered. Opals are one of the most valuable gemstones on the planet – one stone alone can fetch a million dollars – and its the dream of striking it rich that drives these crews to push their bodies and bank accounts to breaking point.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: This reality TV show follows Marty Raney and his two children, Matt Raney and Misty Bilodeau, who are successful homesteaders from the state of Alaska and have the skills needed to fish, hunt, raise livestock, and otherwise survive in an untamed landscape. Struggling homesteaders across the country call these experts to help them save their homesteads and become self-sufficient while they teach them the necessary skills to survive the wilderness.

programme.title: Dirty Jobs
programme.desc: Dirty Jobs is an American documentary show following Mike Rowe, as he travels around the country meeting people who do some of the most difficult, odd, dangerous and challenging jobs that exist. He joins the employees on a typical work day, trying out the jobs himself, which often ends in humorous scenes, but helps him gain respect for these hardworking people. Watch him engage in constant practical jokes with his crew members, as he works as a coal miner, a snake researcher, a truck cleaner and much more.

programme.title: Misfit Garage
programme.desc: Misfit Garage is a reality TV show, a spin off from Fast N Loud. It features two of the mechanics fired from that shows Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage, Tom Smith and Jordan Butler, as well as Thomas Weeks and Scot McMillan, who together start a new company, Fired Up Garage. The crew run into former co-workers of the shop they were all fired from by Richard Rawlings and who they later find out is their new shop landlord. It takes a lot of courage to face the problems from the past and deal with the challenging present, but this is exactly what the guys do.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: This reality TV show follows Marty Raney and his two children, Matt Raney and Misty Bilodeau, who are successful homesteaders from the state of Alaska and have the skills needed to fish, hunt, raise livestock, and otherwise survive in an untamed landscape. Struggling homesteaders across the country call these experts to help them save their homesteads and become self-sufficient while they teach them the necessary skills to survive the wilderness.

programme.title: Dream Journey
programme.desc: February 2017 saw me embark upon a travel expedition through Scotland, Poland, France, Mexico, Belize and, (alas!), back. Not only was it the first time I ventured out to Central America, but also the first time I seriously pushed my bravery boundaries to do a whole lot of things Id never tried before. I defeated my life-long fear of scubadiving and skydiving, (the Carribbean vistas do help! - No danger Id do that again in Aberdeen), I went zip-lining over a Mexican jungle, I tried habanero-packed streetfood, (failed at that miserably), and organic tequila, (managed that better;), I climbed a Maya pyramid in the middle of a Belizean rainforest and fed hibiscus flowers to a very extravagant donkey. Most importantly, however, I got to know some incredible people - from shamans, wanderers and artists to refugees, businesswomen and expat cowboys. And thanks to aaaall of that, I also got to know a little bit more about myself for visiting the most remote corners of our planet reminds you how different and yet how similar we all are. Im looking forward to sharing my incredible experience in 5 exciting episodes of our travel series, which really turned out to be a Dream Journey:) I simply cannot wait for more!

programme.title: Travel By Dart
programme.desc: Travel by Dart is a series that features countries that are not necessarily top tourist attractions. However, Sorin finds all the hidden gems that make a region stand out. It is the case of Cambodia, too, a country that became one of Sorins all-time favorites. This episode shows the host discovering the unseen beauty of the nation. The host takes part in an emotional Buddhist monk ceremony, then plants mangroves and immerses himself in the villagers lifestyle. A great visit to the famous Angkor Wat is a must, but his favorite part was a sunset expedition on Samsara, a water version of the Orient Express train. The episode is not complete without a few personal touches and stunts, so this is another must-see show. At the end of it, the dart throw ceremony brings up a huge surprise.

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: When Portuguese seafarers discovered the island of Madeira in 1419, it was completely uninhabited and covered with impenetrable forests. They rolled up their sleeves and got to work. They built canals called "levadas" to distribute water from the islands mountainous center all over the rest of the island. Over a thousand kilometers of them are now walkable, allowing you to get to wild, remote locations with waterfalls and incredible panoramas. Madeira is located in the path of the Gulf Stream, thanks to which it isnt just green, but blooming, all year round.

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: Tenerife is the largest and most diverse of the seven Canary Island. It is home to Spains highest mountain - Pico del Teide with an elevation of nearly 4OOO meters. Tenerife includes an incredible ten defined climate zones!!! There are substantial differences between the north and the south of the island. The northern, windward side receives three fourths of all precipitation, which is why it is green year round. The significant differences in elevation also contribute to the great contrasts, as do the mountain ranges extending through the middle of the island. You can experience large differences in temperature on Tenerife, especially in the winter months- you can swim and sunbathe on the southern beaches, while its freezing and snowing on the summit of Teide.

programme.title: Andalusia: The Moorish Architecture
programme.desc: Andalusia, the Spanish territory has a confluence of cultures which is represented in its architecture! Visigothic, Roman, Byzantine and Arab - the structures in the region display all these influences. Between 8th and 15th century, several dynasties from Arab to Berber conquered Andalusia impacting the way of life of people. The film tells this story through beautiful edifices of Andalusia.

programme.title: Japanese Heights
programme.desc: There is more to Japans natural landscape than just Mount Fuji! Discover the countrys numerous mountains and the ethos of the people who live there. From mountains with eight peaks, mountain gods who keep locals in their awe to building snow monsters and embracing modern activities like skiing - this documentary shows the unseen side to Japan!

programme.title: The Boy From the Wild
programme.desc: Growing up on a Game Reserve meant to help wildlife get out of captivity, it shares how it began and how Peter Meyer survived some incredible moments in the wild.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: Ordsall Hall is over 820 years old. It has been put to many uses including a family home, working mens club and church hall. With over 15 hauntings and many sightings, Ordsall Hall will certainly keep the team busy.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: The Hack Green Secret Nuclear Bunker is a former government-owned nuclear bunker located at Hack Green, Cheshire, England. It Started as a decoy site for enemy bombers but later developed into a legitimate base. Now it is ripe with hauntings.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We set sail to the land of the Norseman in Oslo, Norway. Well climb the fort walls at Akershus Fortress and discover the North and South Poles at the Fram Museum. Then, well unearth ancient viking ship treasures at the Viking Ship Museum, and well brave the open waters of the Pacific with Thor Heyerdahl at the Kon-tiki museum.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: In this first of a two-parter on the Mara, we follow the migration in anticipation of the famous river crossings. We find all three big cats and hyena waiting for their chance to get their share of the migrants. During migration, the animal numbers are staggering.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: We elect to stay on a few extra days to try and obtain some good leopard footage. These are the most elusive of the "Big Twelve" and filming them is a major challenge. In the process of tracking leopards, we run across a newborn gazelle trying to walk for the first time. Will it succeed before the predators find it? Can we find and film a leopard up close?

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: China Uncovered is a documentary exploring the changing culture of China, from everyday life to nature and cities, from tradition to modernism. Discover this country from the perspective of locals, including a photographer, a laborer and an architect. Witness how Shanghai turned into a mega city from a small fishing village, and how is that affecting the everyday life and traditional practices and beliefs.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Travel Thru History is an Emmy-nominated, un-hosted lifestyle/travel series designed to spark interest and enthusiasm in viewers about our worlds rich and fascinating history by traveling to diverse locales across the globe. Locations include New Orleans, Las Vegas, Oslo, Belize, Dublin and more. In this episode we visit the Kennedy Space Center located on Floridas famous "Space Coast." Well speak to NASA engineers about the past, present and future of American space travel, as well as take a look at the attractions KSC has to offer.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Bonjour! Were headed to Quebec Province on todays show. First, we get blown away by the thunderous pipes at Montreals Notre Dame Basilica. After that, we go underneath the city at the Pointe a Calliere archaeology museum. Next, well learn about the native ecosystem at the gigantic, indoor, BioDome. Lastly, well learn about the 1967 Montreal Expo at the structures that are still visited today.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after youve lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bills bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The International Space Station is undoubtedly the jewel in the crown of low Earth orbit; observation post, research lab and class room. Equally however there are many other assets orbiting Earth that are even more important to our everyday lives; delivering communications, weather observation, global positioning and resource management the list is growing with every year.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Our seafaring nature has translated well to the space age, seeking to sail out into the unknown in search of riches of one kind or another. While Europe and Asia continue their interest in the resource rich Moon, The United States and NASA have set their sights on nothing less than manned missions to Mars. Can they manage to go shore to shore on the most dangerous of unknown seas, deep space.
